top.title: 'We need food, we have no food' - desperation takes hold in Jamaica after hurricane
top.summary: People in Black River have not seen any aid, telling the BBC that they are fighting to survive.

top.title: Defence of Donbas town a priority, Zelensky says, as special forces deployed
top.summary: Army sources tell the BBC military intelligence special forces are being used to protect supply lines into Pokrovsk.

top.title: Tanzania president wins election as hundreds feared dead in unrest
top.summary: Demonstrations continued on Friday as young protesters denounced the election as unfair.

top.title: Pornhub says UK visitors down 77% since age checks came in
top.summary: The site tells BBC News it believes people are viewing riskier sites - but they may just be using VPNs.

top.title: Security concerns over system at heart of digital ID
top.summary: The government is facing questions over whether One Login can be trusted to keep people's personal data secure.

top.title: Watchdog slams O2 over unexpected price rise
top.summary: The media regulator said it was disappointed O2 raised prices more than was advertised when customers took out contracts.
